summary: The Drones for America Act aims to increase tariffs on unmanned aircraft and their components imported from China. It also strengthens rules of origin, restricting the entry of drones and parts containing Chinese-made components. Additionally, the Act establishes a Secure Unmanned Aircraft Systems Trust Fund to provide grants to first responders, farmers, ranchers, critical infrastructure providers, and U.S. manufacturers for the purchase, lease, and development of secure unmanned aircraft systems and related components.
